attributes.action: Stop the Gov from buying a Plane.
attributes.additional_details:
The evidence is on the media websites. BBC.co.uk. RT tv also etc.

This is out of order for a government to waste money when the poor are being hit with cuts to child tax credits and housing benefits
attributes.background:
David Cameron wants a private plane for him and his party/Government. 

This is being paid for by the tax payers.  He's cutting services but spending our taxes on what ever he likes.
